Package polimi.ingsoft.server.model.player

Class PlayerTest

java.lang.Object
polimi.ingsoft.server.model.player.PlayerTest
class PlayerTest extends Object
Unit tests for the Player class. These tests validate the behavior of the Player class methods.

  • Method Details

    • init

      @BeforeAll static void init() throws FileNotFoundException, com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Initializes common objects needed for testing. Creates a Player instance with a hand, board, and initial state.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If a required file is not found.
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If there is an error in processing JSON data.

    • getBoard

      @Test void getBoard()
      Tests the getBoard() method of the Player class. Verifies that the player's board is retrieved correctly.

    • getNickname

      @Test void getNickname()
      Tests the getNickname() method of the Player class. Verifies that the player's nickname is retrieved correctly.

    • getQuestCard

      @Test void getQuestCard()
      Tests the getQuestCard() method of the Player class. Verifies that initially, no quest card is assigned to the player.

    • setQuestCard

      @Test void setQuestCard()
      Tests the setQuestCard() method of the Player class. Verifies that the player's quest card can be set and retrieved correctly.

    • getHand

      @Test void getHand()
      Tests the getHand() method of the Player class. Verifies that the player's hand is retrieved correctly.

    • addToHand

      @Test void addToHand()
      Tests the addToHand() method of the Player class. Verifies that a resource card can be added to the player's hand.

    • removeFromHand

      @Test void removeFromHand()
      Tests the removeFromHand() method of the Player class. Verifies that a resource card can be removed from the player's hand.
